channel.title: Not a safe zone
channel.description:
well im having a problem here. i want to make the place ::pkbox just like in fr33sc4pe, but im not using that source. i already have the coords and everything. but in this server you can only pk in the wildy not anywhere else, so i decided to make pkbox so they can fight there too, as a popular fighting zone. i get the coords of what i want and i want to make it an attackable zone.
the coords are the following :
[code]if (absY >=2764 && absY <=2772 && absX >=2759 && absX <=2761) if (absY >=2764 && absY <=2766 && absX >=2762 && absX <=2767) if (absY >=2764 && absY <=2772 && absX >=2768 && absX <=2770)[/code] all in one line of course.
i can't add it in public boolean NonWildy because its for safe zones. so do i have to edit the coords that are already there so it cannot include the coords above ^^. and where do i add them?[br][size=1]Posted on: March 25, 2007, 03:01:17 PM[/size][hr]Nvm, i just copied the public boolean from fr33sc4p3 sry fr33 lol. well thanks for all ur help -.-.......

item.title: Not a safe zone
item.dc:creator: @icauseownage icauseownage
item.description:
@icauseownage wrote:

well im having a problem here. i want to make the place ::pkbox just like in fr33sc4pe, but im not using that source. i already have the coords and everything. but in this server you can only pk in the wildy not anywhere else, so i decided to make pkbox so they can fight there too, as a popular fighting zone. i get the coords of what i want and i want to make it an attackable zone.

the coords are the following :

if (absY >=2764 && absY <=2772 && absX >=2759 && absX <=2761) if (absY >=2764 && absY <=2766 && absX >=2762 && absX <=2767) if (absY >=2764 && absY <=2772 && absX >=2768 && absX <=2770)
all in one line of course.

i can’t add it in public boolean NonWildy because its for safe zones. so do i have to edit the coords that are already there so it cannot include the coords above ^^. and where do i add them?[br][size=1]Posted on: March 25, 2007, 03:01:17 PM[/size][hr]Nvm, i just copied the public boolean from fr33sc4p3 sry fr33 lol. well thanks for all ur help -.-…
